item.title: Installation of PETSc
item.description: Introduction This article will cover the installation of the PETSc library, including the common installation for Linux and the attempt on Windows. Installation for Linux This article is applicable to the building of PETSc-3.14.1. You can download the newest version by: git clone -b release https://gitlab.com/petsc/petsc.git #If haven't the git tool, you can install it through 'apt'. #Follow steps will show how to use 'apt'. or search the applicable version through the link:
